intro: Diascia rotundifolia, commonly known as the round-leaf diascia, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It is a member of the family Acanthaceae and is characterized by its compact growth habit and showy, tubular flowers. The leaves are typically round or heart-shaped, giving the plant its common name. It produces vibrant flowers in shades of red, orange, and yellow, often appearing in clusters.
